text: Best primary school as a efps alumni. Rich in culture, helpful teachers with an encouraging principal. 10/10 in terms of hygiene and cleanliness. Love the school food, healthy yet tasty ! Strongly promotes learning through play. i have had an extremely good experience studying here for 6 years. This school is great as a neighbourhood school.

Last year i was in this school and the old principle (mr saw )
was kind as he make the school not a bully place but my younger brother study in the school hates the new one and like the old

This school was good until the new principal came this year, no one wants to hear your 1 hour speech at the end of a day. Worse way to end it lol. Stop making food options vegan, how will students get their protein?? WHO DO YOU THINK YOU ARE CHANGING THE SCHOOL MOTTO BRO üôèüôèüôè

Went for the Orientation, not the best in term of maintenances appearance, a bit run down and the garden is a joke. Students are well behaved but times will tell. My child is settling in quite fast, already make few friends. Seems to have few foreigners student. Principal speak lengthy on nurturing a better person, treat others with respect, and pride itself having the best admin but perhaps walk the talk by responding to emails first. Send numerous email to school yet after 3months still no reply. If not for the CCA you offered and relatively close proximity, lesser of the bullying case, i might having second thoughts.

I love this school! the school is the first primary school in Punggol and the building is so cool with good layout and space.

Additionally, the new design in front makes the building fresh.
